    • Constructor Detail

      • FamtoHarvestTrigger

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act(GameLogic game)
        Controls if there's at least a Family Member in the current player Personal Board that can be put in at least one Harvest Cell (with or without the malus value):
        1. It finds the Family Member with the greater Action Value and eventually adds the player cards's action bonuses and all of the player's servants.
        2. Then it checks the legality of the action with that Family Member for every cell of the Harvest:
          • If the action is legal, the method moves to the Family Member choice.
          • Else, it returns to the Action choice.
        All of this controls are diversified depending on the Family Member color (neutral/colored).
        Specified by:
        act in interface ActionChoice

      • setIndex

        public void setIndex(int i)
        Specified by:
        setIndex in interface ActionChoice
